long_description: Earflaps and a fleece lining make the Screamer Static hat a great topper for icy, wintry weather, while the bright blue exterior is sure to brighten up cloudy skies. Acrylic knit exterior is soft and breathable; synthetic fleece lining wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable even when you warm up. Closeout.
short_description: Earflaps and a fleece lining make the Screamer Static hat a great topper for icy, wintry weather, while the bright blue exterior is sure to brighten up cloudy skies.
